content.title: Add Pass Through Properties to the Component
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, expand Components > userEntry.emailField and select the txtEmailID text box.
  2. From the upper-right corner of Iris, in the Properties panel, click Text Box.
  3. Under the General section, right-click on the following properties and select Add Property to Component.
    • Max characters
    • Placeholder
